title.rendered: Official Goldfields College Prospectus 2024 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The Goldfields College consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Goldfields College admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Goldfields College based on the information provided within it.

Goldfields College Student Portal

Note: Goldfields College’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Goldfields College Prospectus 2024

The Goldfields College   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.gfc.edu.za/.

Goldfields College PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD
